cards.question: 不过
meaning: anyway (to get back to a previous topic)

cards.question: 不得不
meaning: have no choice or option but to

cards.question: 场
meaning: large place used for a specific purpose
classifier for sporting or recreational activities

cards.question: 吵
meaning: to disturb by making a noise

cards.question: 出差
meaning: to go on an official or business trip

cards.question: 词典
meaning: also written 辭典|辞典[cí diǎn]

cards.question: 打针
meaning: to give or have an injection

cards.question: 戴
meaning: to put on or wear (glasses, hat, gloves etc)

cards.question: 代替
meaning: to substitute (X for Y, or a number in an algebraic expression)

cards.question: 刀
meaning: classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)

cards.question: 到底
meaning: when all is said and done

cards.question: 底
meaning: the end of a period of time

cards.question: 断
meaning: to give up or abstain from sth

cards.question: 反映
meaning: used erroneously for 反應|反应

cards.question: 父亲
meaning: also pr. with light tone [fù qin]

cards.question: 干燥
meaning: to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)

cards.question: 感情
meaning: deep affection for sb or sth

cards.question: 挂
meaning: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)
classifier for sets or clusters of objects

cards.question: 汗
meaning: to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)

cards.question: 尽管
meaning: do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)
(go ahead and do it) without hesitating

cards.question: 竟然
meaning: to go as far as to

cards.question: 究竟
meaning: after all (when all is said and done)

cards.question: 看法
meaning: way of looking at a thing

cards.question: 来不及
meaning: there's not enough time (to do sth)

cards.question: 来得及
meaning: able to do sth in time

cards.question: 俩
meaning: two (colloquial equivalent of 兩個|两个)

cards.question: 连
meaning: (used with 也, 都 etc) even

cards.question: 乱
meaning: in a confused state of mind

cards.question: 母亲
meaning: also pr. with light tone [mǔ qin]

cards.question: 排列
meaning: permutation (i.e. ordered choice of n elements out of m)

cards.question: 篇
meaning: bound set of bamboo slips used for record keeping (old)

cards.question: 起来
meaning: (after a verb, indicates beginning or completeness)

cards.question: 师傅
meaning: respectful form of address for older men

cards.question: 十分
meaning: to divide into ten equal parts

cards.question: 收
meaning: in care of (used on address line after name)

cards.question: 抬
meaning: (of two or more persons) to carry

cards.question: 汤
meaning: water in which sth has been boiled

cards.question: 提前
meaning: to shift to an earlier date
to do sth ahead of time

cards.question: 填空
meaning: to fill in a blank (e.g. on questionnaire or exam paper)

cards.question: 通过
meaning: to pass (a bill or inspection etc)

cards.question: 呀
meaning: (particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)

cards.question: 咱们
meaning: we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)

cards.question: 招聘
meaning: to invite applications for a job

cards.question: 主动
meaning: to do sth of one's own accord
opposite: passive 被動|被动[bèi dòng]
